title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Xenon Pharmaceuticals Inc

content.text: Xenon Pharmaceuticals Inc completes its initial public offering (IPO).
Xenon Pharmaceuticals Inc announces a 2-for-1 stock split.
Xenon Pharmaceuticals Inc enters into a collaboration agreement with a major pharmaceutical company.
Xenon Pharmaceuticals Inc announces a 3-for-1 stock split.
Xenon Pharmaceuticals Inc collaborates with a leading biopharmaceutical company for the development of a novel therapy.
Xenon Pharmaceuticals Inc announces a 2-for-1 reverse stock split.
Xenon Pharmaceuticals Inc partners with a global healthcare company to advance a potential treatment for a rare genetic disorder.

news.headline: Xenon Pharmaceuticals Announces Closing of $345.0 Million Upsized Public Offering Including Full Exercise of the Underwriters’ Option to Purchase Additional Shares
news.summary: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, Dec. 04, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Xenon Pharmaceuticals Inc. (Nasdaq:XENE), a neurology-focused biopharmaceutical company, today announced the closing of its previously announced underwritten public offering of 9,846,157 common shares, which includes 1,384,615 shares sold upon the full exercise of the underwriters’ option to purchase additional shares, and pre-funded warrants to purchase up to 769,230 common shares. The common shares were offered at a public offering

news.headline: Xenon Pharmaceuticals Provides Updates on Neurology Pipeline Programs at the Annual Meeting of the American Epilepsy Society (AES 2023)
news.summary: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, Dec. 02, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Xenon Pharmaceuticals Inc. (Nasdaq:XENE), a neurology-focused biopharmaceutical company, today announced it will provide updates on its neurology programs at the Annual Meeting of the American Epilepsy Society (AES 2023). Mr. Ian Mortimer, Xenon’s President and Chief Executive Officer, stated, “Xenon will have another strong presence at AES this year, with many presentations and activities aimed at raising awareness about our XEN1101
